DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-label, single treatment study. All subjects will receive one year of oral contraceptive therapy with DR-1011. Study participants will receive physical and gynecological exams, including Pap smear. During the study, all participants will be required to complete a diary.
DOC.brief_title: Open-label Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of an Extended-cycle, Low Dose Combination Oral Contraceptive
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal Not pregnant or breastfeeding Sexually active at risk of pregnancy Any contraindication to the use of oral contraceptives Pregnancy within the last 3 months Smoking > 10 cigarettes per day
